snippet: Under pressure, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel instead ordering military leaders to develop a pin or device that would be attached to existing medals or ribbons.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel cancels creation of new military medal for drone operators and cyberwarriors, instead ordering development of pin or device to be attached to existing medals or ribbons.
lead_paragraph: Under pressure, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel instead ordering military leaders to develop a pin or device that would be attached to existing medals or ribbons.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
